title.rendered: E-Book |  It’s Time For A Change

content.rendered: Cory Minter, President of Bridge Careers Travel Agencies, has written a free e-book to help job seekers to keep on track with their job search.  This short and to-the-point read will give some simple points for the job hunt and interview process.  Click on the link for a free download.   It’s Time For A Change If this really helped and you want more information, visit Amazon to purchase Cory’s book Handbook to Getting Hired – A Guide to Writing An Effective Resume and Finding Your Ideal Job.
